root.name: Workspace Editor
root.description: Edit the workspaces with a simple drag'n drop system (Requires Icy 1.2 at least).
root.author: tprovoost - Thomas Provoost
root.changelog:
- Version 1.3.0.0 Date 2017-06-15 14:36:56
Minor change on default window size and location.
- Version 1.2.2.0 Date 2013-02-07 10:46:01
Corrected issue with Component Must Be Showing Location On Screen
- Version 1.2.1.0 Date 2013-01-14 13:53:55
Corrected issue that came with 1.3.0.0
- Version 1.2.0.3 Date 2012-10-24 12:07:05
Corrected infinite loop happening on mac because of repaint.
- Version 1.2.0.2 Date 2012-10-22 14:23:10
* correct getLocation issue, should not happen again.
- Version 1.2.0.1 Date 2012-06-29 15:33:44
Corrected an issue when renaming workspace.
- Version 1.2.0.0 Date 2012-06-27 17:20:23
Added some GUI improvements: * now rendering stays normal when only one plugin is shown
* expanding the window will correctly expand the 2 views.
- Version 1.1.2.6 Date 2012-06-08 13:27:35
Now displays an image explaining how to make visible your workspace.
- Version 1.1.2.5 Date 2012-06-07 17:24:09
* corrected bug on enable workspace (it was impossible) * added an ugly message at creation of a workspace, will be nice soon.
- Version 1.1.2.4 Date 2012-05-22 15:37:48
Cannot enable an empty workspace anymore to avoid crash on open.
- Version 1.1.2.3 Date 2012-04-24 11:14:07
* No change, only recompiled for Icy 1.2.3.0.
- Version 1.1.2.2 Date 2012-04-19 13:46:30
* Move Up et Move Down to plugins inside bands. * Working on a drag 'n drop version of this.
- Version 1.1.2.1 Date 2012-03-14 15:47:49
- Added Rename Band feature
- Version 1.1.2.0 Date 2012-03-07 14:42:37
- Added icons to plugins - added a filter
- Version 1.1.1.3 Date 2012-02-21 13:56:51
Previous version implemented a non existent feature of release version. Everything should be ok now.
- Version 1.1.1.2 Date 2012-02-20 17:29:05
- Added feature: possibility to activate or deactivate the workspace directly in the Properties dialog; - Fixed an issue with Properties Dialog.
- Version 1.1.1.1 Date 2012-02-20 14:51:34
- Fixed non appearing confirmation dialogs when deleting; - Fixed issues with sys.xml, now the only possible action is the removal of plugins from "New" band; - Fixed issue with empty space at end of popuppanels; - Added a title to popup menus for more clarity.
- Version 1.1.1.0 Date 2012-02-03 15:20:22
- GUI colors for selection more visible - escape key supported while drag'n'drop - multi selection feature added
- Version 1.1.0.2 Date 2012-01-17 11:31:54
* Separator between left and right modified * reload button now restart Icy * possibility to reload list of plugins
- Version 1.1.0.1 Date 2012-01-16 11:32:09
Corrected a bug in icy 1.2. Should now be completely functional.
- Version 1.1.0.0 Date 2011-12-23 17:01:31
Colors are better based on Color Scheme.
- Version 1.0.0.1 Date 2011-12-06 16:14:09
Prevents from running if version not ok.
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2011-12-06 16:08:55
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2011-12-06 16:05:15
